Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute near Damen/14th
ShortDescription: Eastbound 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Roosevelt, Ashland, 18th, and Damen due to, street blockage near Damen/14th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Roosevelt, Ashland, 18th, and Damen due to, street blockage near Damen/14th.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Fullerton to Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Fullerton to Clark/Lake due to a mechanical problem on a train.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Fullerton to Clark/Lake due to a mechanical problem on a train.

As a result, trains are operating only between Kimball and Fullerton at this time.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

This can include the #37 Sedgwick bus.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
